tokens.text: replaces and modifies blocks based on a series of rules

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: World BlockRules
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Replaces and modifies blocks based on a series of rules

fields.title: Rules
fields.description: List of block rules evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. Block rules are evaluated in order. If a block rule succeeds and the output_state is set, the output_state block will be used as the input_predicate block for subsequent rules.
